Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Yld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.Yld
  • public final class Yld
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that hold global properties and methods of Yield Game Engine
    Since:
    4_alpha1

                                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
